title: The Trendityville Horror 11/1: Mariah Carey, 'I Drink Wine', Kristy Swanson, 'Martin', Lindsey Graham, Melania Trump, 'Squid Game'
itunes:title: The Trendityville Horror 11/1: Mariah Carey, 'I Drink Wine', Kristy Swanson, 'Martin', Lindsey Graham, Melania Trump, 'Squid Game'
description:
In this edition of The Trendityville Horror, Jack and Miles discuss Mariah Carey, Adele's new song 'I Drink Wine', Kristy Swanson getting COVID, classic black sitcoms finally appearing on HBO Max, Lindsey Graham being Billy Zane from Titanic, Melania Trump hating her life (and her husband), and 'Squid Game' putting up numbers

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
